text: The 1975 Soviet First League was the fifth season of the Soviet First League and the 35th season of the Soviet second tier league competition. ==Final standings== ===Relegation Play-Off=== [Tashkent] * Zvezda Perm 2-1 UralMash Sverdlovsk ==See also== * Soviet First League ==External links== * 1975 season. RSSSF 1975 2 Soviet Soviet
title: 1975 Soviet First League
